about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello! Iâ€™m Mah, a nail designer passionate about what I do and specialized in turning nails into true works of art. At just 18 years old and with 2 years of experience in the field, I have already had the opportunity to serve many clients, always striving to deliver quality, beauty, and healthy nails. I am an outgoing, communicative, focused, and extremely detail-oriented professional, qualities that are reflected in every appointment. I work with great love, dedication, and attention to detail, because I truly believe that every client is unique and deserves flawless results. Here, you will find professional service, high-quality products, and the best techniques on the market, all designed to enhance your self-esteem even more. It will be a pleasure to take care of your nails! ðŸ’…âœ¨
about.intro: Learn about my journey and passion for the world of nails.

services.title: Services
services.intro: Discover our main services and choose what best suits your needs.

manicure.title: Manicure and Pedicure
manicure.description: Complete treatment for your hand and foot nails, including cuticle removal, filing, polishing and painting.

gel.title: Gel Extension on Tips
gel.description: Nail extension using tips and gel to create long-lasting and natural-looking nails.

gelcoating.title: Gel Coating
gelcoating.description: Application of a gel layer over natural nails, providing shine, strength and durability, without increasing the length.

geloverlay.title: Gel Overlay
geloverlay.description: Application of a protective layer over the natural nail, strengthening, leveling, and preventing breakage, with a natural finish and high durability.

footspa.title: Foot Spa
footspa.description: A relaxing and revitalizing foot treatment that promotes deep hydration, exfoliation, and an overall sense of well-being.
